  **What and how do people remember?**

  <p class="hero-bio">
    This MSc project is led by <a href="https://suliahmed.com" target="_blank">Sulaiman Ahmed</a> under the supervision of <a href="https://www.warrickroseboom.com/"  target="_blank">Dr. Warrick Roseboom</a> at the University of Sussex. The research examines episodic memory through human behavioral data, fMRI scans, and model-segmented events. The findings are validated through an online study measuring people's recall of natural video scenes.
